title: Android co-founder to Bill Gates: So, sorry Bill, you're more responsible for Microsoft losing the $400 b - The Times of India
summary:

How a little-known Finnish company became one of the world’s hottest gadget startups | Company Business News - Mint
summary:
How a Little-Known Finnish Company Became One of the World’s Hottest Gadget Startups

Publication Date: Current Date & Source: Company Business News

In the startup world, Oura stands out as a profitable unicorn in the competitive consumer electronics market. Their smart ring has gained millions of users by focusing on health tracking rather than just fitness metrics.

  • Oura is valued over $5 billion and remains profitable.
  • The smart ring tracks heart rate, skin temperature, and movement.
  • It provides users with a “readiness score” based on comprehensive health data.
  • Insights are derived from a vast health data pool, contributed by over 70,000 users.
  • The ring can predict when wearers may be getting sick.
"Users wake up to a 'readiness score' that factors in sleep quality and stress levels."

The Oura smart ring is transforming how individuals approach health monitoring, signaling a new direction in consumer electronics.
newTitle: How a Little-Known Finnish Company Became One of the World’s Hottest Gadget Startups

Mark Zuckerberg Announces the End of Smartphones and the Rise of Their Revolutionary Replacement - The Daily Galaxy --Great Discoveries Channel
summary:
Mark Zuckerberg Announces the End of Smartphones and the Rise of Their Revolutionary Replacement

Date: Not specified. Source: Not specified.

Introduction: Mark Zuckerberg, the CEO of Meta, shares his vision that smart glasses will replace smartphones as the primary device for communication within the next decade, coinciding with increased investments in augmented reality technology.

  • Smartphones have dominated technology for 30 years, revolutionizing communication and productivity.
  • Market saturation and slow innovation in smartphones raise questions about better ways to integrate technology.
  • Smart glasses promise hands-free interaction and a more integrated digital experience.
  • Companies like Meta, Apple, and Google are heavily investing in the development of smart glasses.
  • Advancements in technology like AR, battery life, AI, and 5G are critical for smart glasses' success.
  • Zuckerberg predicts a shift to smart glasses as the primary digital interaction tool by the 2030s.
“Computing should be natural and technology should blend into the background of daily life.”

Conclusion: If Zuckerberg's prediction holds, the 2030s could signify a transformative era where technology becomes less intrusive and more integrated into our daily lives.
newTitle: Mark Zuckerberg Announces the End of Smartphones and the Rise of Their Revolutionary Replacement

summary:
Samsung Galaxy S24 5G Plus Gets Massive Discount On THESE Platforms During Republic Day Sale; Check Deals

Date: January 22, 2025 Source: Zee News

The Samsung Galaxy S24 5G Plus receives significant discounts on Amazon and Flipkart during the Republic Day sale, just days before the launch of the Galaxy S25 series. The price reductions make the flagship model more accessible to buyers.

  • The Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus 5G (256 GB) originally priced at Rs 99,999 is discounted to Rs 64,999 on Amazon, a 35% discount.
  • Amazon includes a cashback offer of Rs 1,949 for Amazon Pay transactions and exchange offers up to Rs 53,200 for old smartphones.
  • On Flipkart, the same model is available for Rs 59,999, reflecting a 40% discount.
  • Flipkart offers 5% cashback with Flipkart Axis Bank Credit Card and exchange values up to Rs 38,150.
“Original price was Rs 99,999; now available at Rs 64,999 on Amazon.”

These discounts provide substantial savings for customers looking to purchase a premium smartphone, highlighting the competitive market just before the launch of new models.
newTitle: Samsung Galaxy S24 5G Plus Gets Massive Discount On Platforms During Republic Day Sale

Do you have persistent bad breath? Doctor shares how it may be related to your gut: 'Instead of using mouthwash…" - Hindustan Times
summary:
Do you have persistent bad breath? Doctor shares how it may be related to your gut: 'Instead of using mouthwash…'

Date: Jan 18, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

This article discusses the potential causes of persistent bad breath and its possible connections to gut health, hydration, and oral microbiome.

  • Persistent bad breath may indicate an issue with gut health or dehydration.
  • Dr. Shirley Koeh emphasizes visiting a dentist if bad breath persists despite good oral hygiene practices.
  • Mouthwash can kill both harmful and beneficial bacteria; using oral probiotics is recommended instead.
  • Hydration is crucial for maintaining oral health and preventing bad breath.
  • The oral microbiome is linked to gut health; addressing gut issues may resolve bad breath directly.
“Having yourself hydrated constantly can help with your problem of bad breath.” - Dr. Shirley Koeh

In conclusion, maintaining good oral hygiene, staying hydrated, and paying attention to gut health are essential for preventing persistent bad breath.
newTitle: Understanding the Causes of Persistent Bad Breath and Its Link to Gut Health

title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series prices leak ahead of January 22 launch event - India Today
summary:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Prices Leak Ahead of January 22 Launch Event

Published On: Jan 18, 2025 | Published By: Aman Rashid

The Galaxy S25 series, set to launch on January 22, is anticipated to see a price increase compared to the previous Galaxy S24 lineup, with significant changes in storage and RAM configurations.

  • The Galaxy S25 base model starts at Rs 84,999, a jump from last year's Rs 74,999.
  • The Galaxy S25+ will begin at Rs 1,04,999, up from Rs 99,999.
  • Galaxy S25 Ultra's starting price is expected at Rs 1,34,999, compared to Rs 1,29,999 for the S24 Ultra.
  • The higher production costs related to the new Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset may contribute to the pricing increase.
“Whether this performance boost justifies the price increase remains to be seen.”

As the launch date nears, Samsung is accepting pre-bookings, indicating strong interest despite higher pricing expectations.
newTitle: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Pricing Expected to Rise Before Launch

title: Santosh Kamath of Franklin Templeton MF is back with a new credit alternative investment fund | Mint - Mint
summary:
Santosh Kamath of Franklin Templeton MF is back with a new credit alternative investment fund

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Mint

Santosh Kamath, the fixed-income chief at Franklin Templeton MF, returns with a new private credit alternative investment fund after dismantling six debt funds in 2020 that totaled ₹25,000 crore.

  • Kamath was responsible for managing the six debt funds when they were wound up.
  • He stepped down from his role in 2023 to lead the newly established alternatives business.
“Unlock Premium Insights in This Article”

This new development reflects a significant shift in strategy as Kamath aims to leverage alternative investment opportunities in the current market landscape.

title: ‘Think independently, don’t be shy about standing out’: Prof Yamuna Krishnan to aspiring women scientists - The Indian Express
summary:
‘Think independently, don’t be shy about standing out’: Prof Yamuna Krishnan to aspiring women scientists

Publication Date: January 18, 2025
Source: The Indian Express

Dr. Yamuna Krishnan, a prominent figure in DNA nanotechnology, encourages aspiring women scientists to follow their own path and think independently. She highlights the importance of addressing gender inequity in science.

  • Dr. Krishnan is a recipient of prestigious awards, including the Shanti Swarup Bhatnagar prize and Infosys Prize.
  • She emphasizes the need for women scientists to be encouraged rather than discouraged.
  • Dr. Krishnan's research involves creating DNA-based devices to study and manipulate living systems.
  • She advocates for improved engagement and investment in India’s research ecosystem.
“To all aspiring women scientists, do not listen to anything anybody tells you, even me. Follow your own path, think independently, do not be shy about standing out.” - Dr. Yamuna Krishnan

This encouraging message calls on aspiring women scientists to challenge societal norms and strive for representation in their fields.
newTitle: Inspiring Advice for Women Scientists from Prof. Yamuna Krishnan

Publication Date: January 18, 2025

Source: India TV News

Apple is set to bring back the iPhone SE lineup after a two-year hiatus with the fourth-generation model expected to launch in April 2025, possibly rebranded as the iPhone 16e.

Key Points:

  • The iPhone SE 4 is rumored to undergo a complete design overhaul with significant upgrades.
  • Leaked images suggest a design similar to the iPhone 14.
  • Expected upgrades include a larger 6.6-inch OLED display, A18 chipset, 8GB of RAM, and a 48MP rear camera.
  • Potential rebranding as the iPhone 16e aligns it with recent high-end models.
“This move could represent a significant leap for Apple’s entry-level iPhone, positioning it as a competitive option for budget-conscious buyers.”
